pkgmetadata.longdescription: Identifiability of linear structural equation models // This package provides routines to check identifiability or non- identifiability of linear structural equation models as described in Drton, Foygel Sullivant (Ann. Statist., 2011) and Foygel, Draisma Drton (Ann. Statist., 2012). The routines are based on the graphical representation of structural equation models by a path diagram/mixed graph.
